channel.title: PI Command Problems. 317
channel.description: ok so i added ::pure ::master ::zerk ::tank and ::setlevel , i added them under [code]if(c.playerRights >= 0) {[/code]. now the weird thing when i put ::item code right under the [code]if(c.playerRights >= 0) {[/code] the ::item code will work but ::tank ::zerk ::setlevel ::pure ::master wont anymore!! and when i put the ::item command under all lvl commands , my lvl commands work but the ::item command wont!! this is so weird never had this before.. any help?

item.title: PI Command Problems. 317
item.dc:creator: @Eson Eson
item.description:
@Eson wrote:

[quote=“Cres, post:2, topic:382214”]if(c.playerRights >= 0) {
is the dumbest exception ever , this basically means every player can do that command so it just stands there doing nothing…[/quote]
Wow, cool thats really the help i needed 0.0

Read full topic

item.description:
@Cres wrote:

if(c.playerRights >= 0) {

is the dumbest exception ever , this basically means every player can do that command so it just stands there doing nothing…
